Body:
I am trying to develop an android app which monitors the TI SensorTag cc2650STK data; accelerometer and gyroscope. I don't know how to enable all the axis (x,y,z) of these sensors. which value I have to write? 

characteristic.setValue(new byte[]{0x?????});

Can anyone explain me with details please?? I found these document from TI but I dont know how to use it:

CC2650 SensorTag User's Guide

I am new in android and IoT.

Thanks in advance.

"
thank u that was very helpful.....

This is what I found on GitHub regarding your question:

The table on that page describes the bit pattern necessary to enable different parts.

For example: 0x007F should enable all axes on the gyro
column10: and mag. I can't recall the exact byte order (it think it's LE)
column11:
so your line of code would look like either:

characteristic.setValue(new byte[] {(byte)0x7F
column13:
(byte)0x7F});

EDIT: I Can confirm it's the first option after reviewing TI's User Guide

"
